titles.title: Honoring the seven members of the crew of the space shuttle Columbia for their heroism and spirit, and paying tribute to the sacrifices made by these men and women on behalf of the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.

bill.summary: 2/4/2003--Introduced. Honors the seven members of the crew of the space shuttle Columbia for their heroism and spirit and pays tribute to their sacrifices on behalf of the Nation.
